actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.
Subcommittee on Taxation and Debt Management. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 98-527.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Taxation and Debt Management

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from taxation corporations which acquire and manage real property for certain other exempt organizations, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to grant tax-exempt status to corporations which acquire and manage real property for certain other tax-exempt organizations. Exempts such corporations from the application of the acquisition indebtedness rules applicable to the unrelated business income of tax-exempt organizations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from taxation corporations which acquire and manage real property for certain other exempt organizations, and for other purposes.
